title: Status of memberships (or subscriptions)?
content:
Hello,

I’m new to Typophile (but a huge fan!) and I’d love to join or subscribe. I’m a bit confused by the current state of affairs…the Membership page mentions an apparently upcoming switch to a subscription system, yet a search yielded a 2005 Membership application form.

What’s the status of things? How can I join? If a new system is coming, is there a general sort of ETA for it? I’m keen to get a t-shirt too, but all of the links to depictions seem to be dead, so I can’t tell what they look like.

thanks very much,  
vv  
J.O.
author: jondru

So in the meantime, what’s the story on memberships? Or subscriptions? I’m all ready to cough up some dough, but I don’t understand the plan.

thanks!
